name: Touhou Fan Game Jam 9
description:
Disclaimer: I ran out of time, so there's no proper title or story, game is not well tested but hopefully playable...

Reimu has received a mysterious invitation for Halloween. Just who might it be...?

Controls:

  • arrow keys: move and jump
  • space: attack
  • esc: pause (no way to quit at the moment)

You can press TAB to reload a level and END to skip to the next one.

Notes:
Submission to Touhou Fan Game Jam 9
This game is a fan work based on Touhou project. All elements of Touhou Project, including characters, music, setting, and concept, are property of ZUN/Team Shanghai Alice.

Known bugs: 

  • Attack animation can get stuck, in that case you have to restart the game
